author: david_larson
post: During a recent bible study our group decided to dissect the available information information on the Shroud. A curiosity arose when we sort of ran out of all evidence and speculations and we focused on the shin a “E” symbol on the forehead often suggested as a run of AB blood precipitated by the crown of thorns. Upon using a HD photo image with a series of enlargements or zooms we captured the image of a crucified man on a cross head turned to the right..
title: STERA:  In Case You Missed It
